Vocabulary is one of the keys to speaking fluent English. Even if your grammar is perfect, if you don’t know the correct words to express yourself in English, you will find it difficult to speak fluently. Luckily, improving your vocabulary is one of the most fun aspects of learning English. 

Use «Vocabulary Builder: New Words» to improve your English vocabulary and see how fun and productive your study time can be.

Our major features: 

○ Daily reminders
You can choose any time of notifications to make learning an everyday habit!

○ Save favorites

○ Sharing a new word with friends!
Send interesting words to all your friends just one tap!

○ Customization
Select theme, change font, color and background image! Our app can help you feel motivated and give you the inspiration to achieve your goals and the same time please your eyes.

○ Categories for you to read at any time.

- Nouns

- Adjectives
- Science

- Travel
- Culture
- People

- Psychology
-…and more!

Learning vocabulary will help you improve your language level and communicate in English confidently and effectively. The English language is among the most voluminous of all languages, and this means that you’ll never run out of vocabulary words to learn and use.

To that end, the time you spend improving your vocabulary skills is actually time invested in your writing skills.
